text:
Hi team,

I am using an ASPX application , I am not able to login to application while recording in J meter , While doing so Application redirects to a application custom error page. We are not observing this behaviour with HP Load runner we are able to successfully record and replay the same.Manually also we are not facing this issue

-> REcording is leading to custom error page in both versions 2.9 and 2.11
-> Replay is working fine in version 2.9 after all the co-relations and same script is again leading to custom error page in 2.11

Kindly help me out this.

Note:

I started J meter with proxy details through command prompt.
creator: abhishek.ramesh@altisource.com
p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
text:
Bugzilla is not a support forum.
Please ask on JMeter User Mailing List.

You are most probably missing some authentication.
Use Template ...> Recording to recode first and probably add HTTP Authorization Manager.

Please don't reply here, use Mailing list.
